definitions.definition: An ancient empire and geographic region of Mesopotamia , existing from 1850 BCE to 539 BCE , based around the city of Babylon ; at its maximum extent, covering parts of modern-day Iraq , Kuwait , Syria and Iran .
A geographic area equivalent to Mesopotamia , from the area of Babylon 's empire at its maximum extent.

main_definition: ( historical ) An ancient empire and geographic region of Mesopotamia , existing from 1850 BCE to 539 BCE , based around the city of Babylon ; at its maximum extent, covering parts of modern-day Iraq , Kuwait , Syria and Iran .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) A geographic area equivalent to Mesopotamia , from the area of Babylon 's empire at its maximum extent.
